title: 基础类型变量的默认值与初始化
content:
定义在方法外的基础类型变量有默认值，允许不初始化。  测试代码：
public class BasicTypes { int i; byte b1; short s; long l; float f; double d; boolean b2; char ch; public static void main(String[] args) { // 定义在方法外的基础类型变量有默认值，允许不初始化。  BasicTypes basicTypes = new BasicTypes(); System.out.printf("Default value of int type is %d
", basicTypes.i); System.out.printf("Default value of byte type is %d
", basicTypes.b1); System.out.printf("Default value of short type is %d
", basicTypes.s); System.out.printf("Default value of long type is %d
", basicTypes.l); System.out.printf("Default value of float type is %f
", basicTypes.f); System.out.printf("Default value of double type is %f
", basicTypes.d); System.out.printf("Default value of boolean type is %s
", basicTypes.b2); System.out.printf("Default value of char type is %x
", (int)basicTypes.ch); } } 测试结果：
Default value of int type is 0 Default value of byte type is 0 Default value of short type is 0 Default value of long type is 0 Default value of float type is 0.000000 Default value of double type is 0.000000 Default value of boolean type is false Default value of char type is 0 可以看到，基本所有基础类型的默认值都是”零值“。
